item.title: BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up
item.dc:creator: Rasika Umamahesh
item.description: The post BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up appeared first on Regent College London.
item.content:encoded:
Home – Courses

BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up

Top Up Degrees

Our BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up is designed to help your thrive within the Finance Sector.

Enquire Now
  • Overview
  • Modules
  • Entry Requirements
  • How to Apply
  • Career Prospects
  • Academic Team
  • FAQs

    • Location

    Regent College London

    June 2021

    September 2021

    January 2022

    April 2022

    Timetable

    Weekday / Weekend / Evening Classes

    Duration

    1 year

    Fee

    £8,000 per year. £9,250 per year from September 2021 (Home fee)

    Career Routes

    RQF Level 6

    Assessment

    Exams, Essays, Reports and Presentations

    Download Course Brochure
    Full Course specification

    Delivered in Partnership with

    Enquire Now

    Overview

    The BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up degree is the perfect addition to your existing HND or Foundation degree qualification, if you are looking to enter or advance within the Finance Industry. This course allows you to gain transferable skills that can be applied within your career as well as everyday life. You will be given a comprehensive understanding into the Finance industry and be able to solve complex problems and generate effective solutions.

    Why Should I Choose the Finance Pathway?

    The BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Pathway will give you the opportunity to explore specialist areas of Finance, including financial reporting for management, the practice and regulation of financial accounting, and the role of the finance manager. In addition, once you have completed the course, you will be equipped with a range of skills including, critical self-reflection and be able to make justified independent judgements as well as successfully select and critically apply appropriate theories.

    When you successfully complete the course, you’ll also receive the CMI Level 5 Award in Leadership and Management and benefit from exemptions from the ACCA (Association of Chartered Certified Accountants) Diploma in Business and Accounting.

    Modules

    • Business Project (BMP6000)
    • Dissertation (BMP6001)
    • Strategic Management (BMP6002)
    • Financial Reporting for Management (BMP6015)
    • Professionals in Practice (BMP6017)
    • Financial Accounting and the Regulatory Framework (BMP6018)

    Entry Requirements

    You’ll have successfully completed a Foundation Degree in Business Management, or another relevant qualification with 120 credits at HE4 and 120 credits at HE5, such as a Higher National Diploma (HND) or Diploma of Higher Education (DipHE).

    If English isn’t your first language you’ll also need IELTS 6.0 with no less than 5.5 in any band (or equivalent).

    If you have non-traditional entry qualifications or relevant work experience we will be happy to consider your application. You’ll be required to attend an interview as part of the admissions process.

    How to Apply

    Each of our courses have different entry requirements and a different admission process. We encourage you to look at our course pages and the How to apply section for detailed information.

    From choosing your desired course, writing your personal statement and submitting the application, you can count on our friendly Recruitment Team for help and guidance at every step of the way. Get in touch to make an initial appointment to discuss your situation.

    Apply Now

    Career Prospects

    Students can flourish within many areas of Finance as the industry has a lot to offer. You can explore different roles within the Finance Sector including, Business Analyst, Banking, Stockbroker, Payroll Manager and much more!

    Academic Team

    Bushan Mohan

    Academic Dean

    FHEA, MSc, BA (Hons)

    Mohammad T Islam

    Head of School of Business and Enterprise

    BSc, MBA, MEd

    FAQs

    How will the course be delivered?

    Read

    The course will initially be delivered digitally via Regent Digital. The delivery of the course will then move to the Regent College London campus for the traditional engagement, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Students will also be given the option of blended learning, where they will attend digital classes for one day and attend classes at the Regent College London campus for traditional engagement for one day, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Close

    What our students say

    Ioana Pitea

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    From the initial interview I was impressed by the welcoming atmosphere as well as by the professionalism with which each situation was handled, including the admission interview. During the courses I was guided by talented and devoted lectures who inspire and support me. I would recommend Regent College to anyone who wants to receive quality knowledge, teaching and support.

    Dorinel Barbanta

    BA Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    I’ve started studying at Regent College to be able to further develop in my career. The college has offered me a lot of support and feedback on my assignments allowing me to be able to aim high and keep working during the week.

    Adina Carmen Hera

    BA (Hons) Business Management

    Even though the time spent at the Regent College was short due to the corona virus pandemic, we continued to receive further guidance and support from every staff member. The lessons delivered digitally were engaging and the tutors were very helpful to students.

    Neima Abdi Daher

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    Regent College London is an outstanding institution where you can approach tutors easily and find lots of support from staff if needed. I’ve being studying at the Regent College for 3 years now, their location access is what attracted me the most from where I live. It’s so multicultural that everyone can fit in comfortably.

    Jeremiah Adekunle Adesanya

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    Excellent educational service with good customer service skills and great experience in student support management.

    Prakash Mandalia

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

    Ionela Perca

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-up

    I have received all the support that I needed as a student. I received prompt answers to all the questions I had. Great staff. I will highly recommend Regent College. The Director of Studies i in Harrow is very friendly, always smiling and supportive. Also the receptionist is very friendly and helped me every single time I need support.

    Adisha Efia Douet

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    It is wonderful to attend Regent College. Staff are very helpful. My lecturer was awesome. My personal situation was challenging and I wanted to give up on many occasions but the college made me realise that I shouldn’t give up. It’s more than just a college. Staff understand that each student has different personal circumstances. They encouraged me and gave me the strength to complete my degree. Honestly I couldn’t have passed the course without the support of the college. Amazing place to study. The vibe, energy is just what you need to focus and achieve your goals. I have landed a good job. Completing the course has opened up many doors for me and I  recommend Regent College. It could change your life.

    Florin Micu

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    Very responsive staff and easy-going, helpful and experienced tutors. Teaching is of high quality. I find the classes organized and i am happy with the way things are going.

    Andreea-Loredana Costea

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    The lecturers teach and explain modules in the best way possible so that students can understand. The recruitment staff are very nice and very helpful every time you have a problem. Quick problem solving and efficient service from the start to the end at Regent College London.

    Hang Boi Quek

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    The lecturers are very professional in carrying out their duties and they are very helpful and patient with the students regardless of their bad behaviour. I strongly recommend Regent College London as college to pursue higher education. The knowledge that I gained from learning at Regent College after attending classes for just two months is more than what I learned at another college where I was for two years.

    Course enquiry

    • We take your privacy seriously and will only use your personal data to provide you the services you have requested from us. We will store your personal data for 5 years.

    •  
    • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

    Regent College London aims to provide current information for our prospectus and website at all times however, it may occasionally be unable to run an advertised course for reasons of operational viability and student experience. In the event that a course is unable to run, or is only available at a different location, we will advise applicants and enrolled students at the earliest possible opportunity in writing. Applicants and students will, wherever feasible, be offered an alternative course or location of study.

    The post BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up appeared first on Regent College London.

    What our students say

    Ioana Pitea

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    From the initial interview I was impressed by the welcoming atmosphere as well as by the professionalism with which each situation was handled, including the admission interview. During the courses I was guided by talented and devoted lectures who inspire and support me. I would recommend Regent College to anyone who wants to receive quality knowledge, teaching and support.

    Dorinel Barbanta

    BA Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    I’ve started studying at Regent College to be able to further develop in my career. The college has offered me a lot of support and feedback on my assignments allowing me to be able to aim high and keep working during the week.

    Adina Carmen Hera

    BA (Hons) Business Management

    Even though the time spent at the Regent College was short due to the corona virus pandemic, we continued to receive further guidance and support from every staff member. The lessons delivered digitally were engaging and the tutors were very helpful to students.

    Neima Abdi Daher

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    Regent College London is an outstanding institution where you can approach tutors easily and find lots of support from staff if needed. I’ve being studying at the Regent College for 3 years now, their location access is what attracted me the most from where I live. It’s so multicultural that everyone can fit in comfortably.

    Jeremiah Adekunle Adesanya

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    Excellent educational service with good customer service skills and great experience in student support management.

    Prakash Mandalia

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

    Ionela Perca

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-up

    I have received all the support that I needed as a student. I received prompt answers to all the questions I had. Great staff. I will highly recommend Regent College. The Director of Studies i in Harrow is very friendly, always smiling and supportive. Also the receptionist is very friendly and helped me every single time I need support.

    Adisha Efia Douet

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    It is wonderful to attend Regent College. Staff are very helpful. My lecturer was awesome. My personal situation was challenging and I wanted to give up on many occasions but the college made me realise that I shouldn’t give up. It’s more than just a college. Staff understand that each student has different personal circumstances. They encouraged me and gave me the strength to complete my degree. Honestly I couldn’t have passed the course without the support of the college. Amazing place to study. The vibe, energy is just what you need to focus and achieve your goals. I have landed a good job. Completing the course has opened up many doors for me and I  recommend Regent College. It could change your life.

    Florin Micu

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    Very responsive staff and easy-going, helpful and experienced tutors. Teaching is of high quality. I find the classes organized and i am happy with the way things are going.

    Andreea-Loredana Costea

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    The lecturers teach and explain modules in the best way possible so that students can understand. The recruitment staff are very nice and very helpful every time you have a problem. Quick problem solving and efficient service from the start to the end at Regent College London.

    Hang Boi Quek

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    The lecturers are very professional in carrying out their duties and they are very helpful and patient with the students regardless of their bad behaviour. I strongly recommend Regent College London as college to pursue higher education. The knowledge that I gained from learning at Regent College after attending classes for just two months is more than what I learned at another college where I was for two years.

    Course enquiry

    • We take your privacy seriously and will only use your personal data to provide you the services you have requested from us. We will store your personal data for 5 years.

    •  
    • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

    Regent College London aims to provide current information for our prospectus and website at all times however, it may occasionally be unable to run an advertised course for reasons of operational viability and student experience. In the event that a course is unable to run, or is only available at a different location, we will advise applicants and enrolled students at the earliest possible opportunity in writing. Applicants and students will, wherever feasible, be offered an alternative course or location of study.

Home – Courses

Master of Business Administration (MBA)

Masters Degrees

The Master of Business Administration (MBA) is a full-time career development programme that covers vital skills and knowledge that can be applied in almost any organisation. The course will help you develop strategic thinking skills demanded of professionals in the global economy today.

Enquire Now
  • Overview
  • Modules
  • Entry Requirements
  • How to Apply
  • Career Prospects
  • Academic Team
  • FAQs

    • Location

    Regent College London

    September 2021

    January 2022

    April 2022

    June 2022

    Timetable

    Weekday / Weekend / Evening

    Duration

    1 year

    Fee

    £8,500 (Home fee) £12,450 (Overseas fee)

    Levels

    RQF Level 7

    Assessment

    Written Exams & Coursework

    Download Course Brochure
    Download the Full Course Specification

    Delivered in Partnership with

    Enquire Now

    Overview

    The Master of Business Administration (MBA) course offers the opportunity to develop your critical knowledge of organisations, awareness of management and leadership practices and the complex business issues they face. You will also be able to develop creative and systematic approaches to underlying business issues, and understanding how business and management practices can be improved Being intellectually stimulating and challenging, the course opens up career development opportunities as well as the opportunity to enhance analytical and critical competencies that are highly valued by employers in today’s global economy.

    Why should I complete the Master of Business Administration (MBA) Degree?

    The Master of Business Administration (MBA) is a great qualification to acquire, as it will take your employability to global fronts. Successful completion of the MBA will provide you with necessary business skills and knowledge needed for roles in various industries. Companies across industries seek business professionals with an MBA and it can create opportunities for promotion or a career change. The universal appeal of this qualification enables you to pursue a global business career.

    Modules

    The modules listed below may be a mixture of compulsory and optional.

    • Leadership and Management – (MBA7010)
    • Financial Management and Decision Making – (MBA7011)
    • Sales Management and Marketing – (MBA7012)
    • Strategic Management – (MBA7013)
    • Change Management – (MBA7014)
    • Human Resource Management – (MBA7015)
    • Research Methods – (MBA7018)
    • Research and Study Skills – (MBA7020)
    • Dissertation II (MBA7019)

    Entry Requirements

    • You should have both of the following: significant work experience in a business or management capacity; and a UK Honours degree/postgraduate degree (or equivalent) in a relevant subject.
    • We’ll consider your application if you don’t possess the above qualifications but have substantial managerial experience.
    • You may be required to attend an interview and/or provide a portfolio of work.
    • When applying you must include a reference from your current employer. The reference should clearly state how long you have been employed by them and give a breakdown of your job content and roles and responsibilities.
    • When applying you must include a reference from your current employer. The reference should clearly state how long you have been employed by them and give a breakdown of your job content and roles and responsibilities.
    • Your application form will need to be accompanied by a reflective overview of the managerial responsibilities you have undertaken to date.
    • If English isn’t your first language you’ll also need IELTS 6.0 with no less than 5.5 in any band (or equivalent). We also accept a range of other English language qualifications – please visit our English Language Requirements web page for more details.

    How to Apply

    Each of our courses have different entry requirements and a different admission process. We encourage you to look at our course pages and the How to apply section for detailed information.
    From choosing your desired course, writing your personal statement and submitting the application, you can count on our friendly Recruitment Team for help and guidance at every step of the way. Get in touch to make an initial appointment to discuss your situation.

    Career Prospects

    The Master of Business Administration qualification will give graduates the opportunity to explore a global career in a variety of roles wide with financial institutions, technology companies, blue-chip companies and even SMEs. These may be within the private, public or voluntary sector, or a multinational company. Graduates may also explore a range of other careers within:

    • Accountancy
    • Hotel and leisure management
    • Public relations
    • Financial management
    • Information systems
    • Product management
    • Teaching and education
    • Media (TV, film, online, newspaper, magazine)
    • Advertising
    • Logistics
    • Banking
    • Project management

    Academic Team

    Bushan Mohan

    Academic Dean

    FHEA, MSc, BA (Hons)

    Mohammad T Islam

    Head of School of Business and Enterprise

    BSc, MBA, MEd

    FAQs

    How will the course be delivered?

    Read

    The course will initially be delivered digitally via Regent Digital. The delivery of the course will then move to the Regent College London campus for the traditional engagement, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Students will also be given the option of blended learning, where they will attend digital classes for one day and attend classes at the Regent College London campus for traditional engagement for one day, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Close
    Go to FAQs

    What our students say

    Adrian Chohan

    MSc International Management

    It is a multicultural college in a diverse, friendly, and vibrant city, that suits everyone. The course is extremely interesting with exciting modules of ‘International marketing’ and ‘Business development’. The diversity of modules really broadened my thinking. The projects and assignments we are doing have taught me a lot about business as a whole – not just in theory, but also in practice. The lectures are engaging and intriguing, delivered by excellent lecturers, have made my journey, educational, informative and life changing.

    The staff are extremely supportive and are always trying to improve the student experience. They work effectively, to maintain an extremely efficient support mechanism which expands on their great customer/student service excellence. I strongly recommend Regent to future alumni and any of my immediate family who decide to return to academia.

    Dorinel Barbanta

    BA Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    I’ve started studying at Regent College to be able to further develop in my career. The college has offered me a lot of support and feedback on my assignments allowing me to be able to aim high and keep working during the week.

    Preslava Plamenova Marinova

    BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

    I would recommend Regent College London because I like how the tutors explain the things which we are learning. Everything is easy to understand and I see when I am at class that the teacher really cares for us. This is the most important thing for me and I really appreciate this!

    Patience Prosper

    BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care (UOB)

    I thoroughly enjoy being a student at Regent College. As a mature student, I know that this is the right place for me because I have received immense and timely support from the day I made contact with the college and this has continued throughout. The college does not only focus on the student’s academic success but also provides services to ensure your mental well-being is not compromised. The lectures are interactive and you’re encouraged to take leadership for your own learning. Since joining Regent I can see a huge difference in my approach to learning and that’s given me confidence. There has been huge support since we moved to virtual lectures. The lecturers are constantly reminding students that they can be contacted by email or on MS Teams if we need any support with any aspect of our degree.

    Gianina-Madlena Patrascanu

    BA (Hons) Marketing with Foundation Year

    Regent College London has this amazing partnership with the Bucks New University, providing you opportunities for your future. It is a very nice environment with lovely students and lovely staff, always happy and ready to help you improve your academic journey. They will give you support and assistance whenever you are in need. I would definitely recommend this institute, if someone is looking for a bachelor degree education. You will feel accepted and supported in this college.

    Robert Masasa

    BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care with Foundation Year (UOB)

    Regent College London is the best college in London because since I started studying there I can see they have the best teachers. The teaching is good and helpful and they are also really organised. If you have any problem in the college, the Student Services team is always is there to help you. For me, I think Regent College London is the best College in London.

    Snezana Radojkovic

    BA (Hons) Business Management

    My academic needs are fully met within a collaborative, encouraging and friendly environment. The importance of education is addressed in well structured program, adequately chosen modules and engaging classes. I do recommend Regent College London.

    Rashed Haider

    BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

    The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

    Abdirahman Farah

    BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

    I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

    Lily Ndosimao

    BSc Health and Social Care (UOB)

    It is my first year at Regent college studying a degree in Health and Social Care. The teaching is excellent and the environment is so clean which makes it a better place to study. I honestly like the staff because they are so polite. I am so lucky to studying here honestly.

     

    Ralitsa Racheva

    HND

    I am really happy with my education at Regent College London and from the professional help of the people who work there. This education opened my mind to see the world in a different way. I will continue to study in order to take bachelor degree and then a masters in the business. I would like to become a business consultant.

     

    Course enquiry

    • We take your privacy seriously and will only use your personal data to provide you the services you have requested from us. We will store your personal data for 5 years.

    •  
    • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

    Regent College London aims to provide current information for our prospectus and website at all times however, it may occasionally be unable to run an advertised course for reasons of operational viability and student experience. In the event that a course is unable to run, or is only available at a different location, we will advise applicants and enrolled students at the earliest possible opportunity in writing. Applicants and students will, wherever feasible, be offered an alternative course or location of study.

    Students will also be given the option of blended learning, where they will attend digital classes for one day and attend classes at the Regent College London campus for traditional engagement for one day, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Close
    Go to FAQs

    What our students say

    Adrian Chohan

    MSc International Management

    It is a multicultural college in a diverse, friendly, and vibrant city, that suits everyone. The course is extremely interesting with exciting modules of ‘International marketing’ and ‘Business development’. The diversity of modules really broadened my thinking. The projects and assignments we are doing have taught me a lot about business as a whole – not just in theory, but also in practice. The lectures are engaging and intriguing, delivered by excellent lecturers, have made my journey, educational, informative and life changing.

    The staff are extremely supportive and are always trying to improve the student experience. They work effectively, to maintain an extremely efficient support mechanism which expands on their great customer/student service excellence. I strongly recommend Regent to future alumni and any of my immediate family who decide to return to academia.

    Dorinel Barbanta

    BA Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    I’ve started studying at Regent College to be able to further develop in my career. The college has offered me a lot of support and feedback on my assignments allowing me to be able to aim high and keep working during the week.

    Preslava Plamenova Marinova

    BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

    I would recommend Regent College London because I like how the tutors explain the things which we are learning. Everything is easy to understand and I see when I am at class that the teacher really cares for us. This is the most important thing for me and I really appreciate this!

    Patience Prosper

    BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care (UOB)

    I thoroughly enjoy being a student at Regent College. As a mature student, I know that this is the right place for me because I have received immense and timely support from the day I made contact with the college and this has continued throughout. The college does not only focus on the student’s academic success but also provides services to ensure your mental well-being is not compromised. The lectures are interactive and you’re encouraged to take leadership for your own learning. Since joining Regent I can see a huge difference in my approach to learning and that’s given me confidence. There has been huge support since we moved to virtual lectures. The lecturers are constantly reminding students that they can be contacted by email or on MS Teams if we need any support with any aspect of our degree.

    Gianina-Madlena Patrascanu

    BA (Hons) Marketing with Foundation Year

    Regent College London has this amazing partnership with the Bucks New University, providing you opportunities for your future. It is a very nice environment with lovely students and lovely staff, always happy and ready to help you improve your academic journey. They will give you support and assistance whenever you are in need. I would definitely recommend this institute, if someone is looking for a bachelor degree education. You will feel accepted and supported in this college.

    Robert Masasa

    BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care with Foundation Year (UOB)

    Regent College London is the best college in London because since I started studying there I can see they have the best teachers. The teaching is good and helpful and they are also really organised. If you have any problem in the college, the Student Services team is always is there to help you. For me, I think Regent College London is the best College in London.

    Snezana Radojkovic

    BA (Hons) Business Management

    My academic needs are fully met within a collaborative, encouraging and friendly environment. The importance of education is addressed in well structured program, adequately chosen modules and engaging classes. I do recommend Regent College London.

    Rashed Haider

    BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

    The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

    Abdirahman Farah

    BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

    I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

    Lily Ndosimao

    BSc Health and Social Care (UOB)

    It is my first year at Regent college studying a degree in Health and Social Care. The teaching is excellent and the environment is so clean which makes it a better place to study. I honestly like the staff because they are so polite. I am so lucky to studying here honestly.

     

    Ralitsa Racheva

    HND

    I am really happy with my education at Regent College London and from the professional help of the people who work there. This education opened my mind to see the world in a different way. I will continue to study in order to take bachelor degree and then a masters in the business. I would like to become a business consultant.

Home – Courses

BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship with Foundation Year

Foundation Year Routes

Our BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up is designed to help your thrive within the Finance Sector.

Enquire Now
  • Overview
  • Modules
  • Entry Requirements
  • How to Apply
  • Career Prospects
  • Academic Team
  • FAQs

    • Location

    Regent College London

    September 2021

    February 2022

    September 2022

    Timetable

    Day / Evening / Weekends

    Duration

    4 years

    Fee

    £8,000 per year. £9,250 per year from September 2021 (Home fee)

    Levels

    RQF Level 3-6

    Assessment

    Knowledge and understanding is tested via a range of reports, portfolios, unseen examinations and coursework. Most assessment tends to be coursework based, which is likely to include reports, essays, group tasks, problem solving exercises, reflective and developmental portfolios, work-based projects, case studies, dissertation, projects, student led seminars, presentations and online tests.

    Download Course Brochure
    Full Course specification

    In partnership with

    Enquire Now

    Overview

    The BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Top-Up degree is the perfect addition to your existing HND or Foundation degree qualification, if you are looking to enter or advance within the Finance Industry. This course allows you to gain transferable skills that can be applied within your career as well as everyday life. You will be given a comprehensive understanding into the Finance industry and be able to solve complex problems and generate effective solutions.

    Why Should I Choose the Finance Pathway?

    The BSc (Hons) Business Management (Finance) Pathway will give you the opportunity to explore specialist areas of Finance, including financial reporting for management, the practice and regulation of financial accounting, and the role of the finance manager. In addition, once you have completed the course, you will be equipped with a range of skills including, critical self-reflection and be able to make justified independent judgements as well as successfully select and critically apply appropriate theories.

    When you successfully complete the course, you’ll also receive the CMI Level 5 Award in Leadership and Management and benefit from exemptions from the ACCA (Association of Chartered Certified Accountants) Diploma in Business and Accounting.

    Modules

    • Business Project (BMP6000)
    • Dissertation (BMP6001)
    • Strategic Management (BMP6002)
    • Financial Reporting for Management (BMP6015)
    • Professionals in Practice (BMP6017)
    • Financial Accounting and the Regulatory Framework (BMP6018)

    Entry Requirements

    You’ll have successfully completed a Foundation Degree in Business Management, or another relevant qualification with 120 credits at HE4 and 120 credits at HE5, such as a Higher National Diploma (HND) or Diploma of Higher Education (DipHE).

    If English isn’t your first language you’ll also need IELTS 6.0 with no less than 5.5 in any band (or equivalent).

    If you have non-traditional entry qualifications or relevant work experience we will be happy to consider your application. You’ll be required to attend an interview as part of the admissions process.

    How to Apply

    Each of our courses have different entry requirements and a different admission process. We encourage you to look at our course pages and the How to apply section for detailed information.

    From choosing your desired course, writing your personal statement and submitting the application, you can count on our friendly Recruitment Team for help and guidance at every step of the way. Get in touch to make an initial appointment to discuss your situation.

    Career Prospects

    Students can flourish within many areas of Finance as the industry has a lot to offer. You can explore different roles within the Finance Sector including, Business Analyst, Banking, Stockbroker, Payroll Manager and much more!

    Academic Team

    Bushan Mohan

    Academic Dean

    FHEA, MSc, BA (Hons)

    Mohammad T Islam

    Head of School of Business and Enterprise

    BSc, MBA, MEd

    FAQs

    How will the course be delivered?

    Read

    The course will initially be delivered digitally via Regent Digital. The delivery of the course will then move to the Regent College London campus for the traditional engagement, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Close

    What our students say

    Ioana Pitea

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    From the initial interview I was impressed by the welcoming atmosphere as well as by the professionalism with which each situation was handled, including the admission interview. During the courses I was guided by talented and devoted lectures who inspire and support me. I would recommend Regent College to anyone who wants to receive quality knowledge, teaching and support.

    Dorinel Barbanta

    BA Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    I’ve started studying at Regent College to be able to further develop in my career. The college has offered me a lot of support and feedback on my assignments allowing me to be able to aim high and keep working during the week.

    Adina Carmen Hera

    BA (Hons) Business Management

    Even though the time spent at the Regent College was short due to the corona virus pandemic, we continued to receive further guidance and support from every staff member. The lessons delivered digitally were engaging and the tutors were very helpful to students.

    Neima Abdi Daher

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    Regent College London is an outstanding institution where you can approach tutors easily and find lots of support from staff if needed. I’ve being studying at the Regent College for 3 years now, their location access is what attracted me the most from where I live. It’s so multicultural that everyone can fit in comfortably.

    Jeremiah Adekunle Adesanya

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    Excellent educational service with good customer service skills and great experience in student support management.

    Prakash Mandalia

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

    Ionela Perca

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-up

    I have received all the support that I needed as a student. I received prompt answers to all the questions I had. Great staff. I will highly recommend Regent College. The Director of Studies i in Harrow is very friendly, always smiling and supportive. Also the receptionist is very friendly and helped me every single time I need support.

    Adisha Efia Douet

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    It is wonderful to attend Regent College. Staff are very helpful. My lecturer was awesome. My personal situation was challenging and I wanted to give up on many occasions but the college made me realise that I shouldn’t give up. It’s more than just a college. Staff understand that each student has different personal circumstances. They encouraged me and gave me the strength to complete my degree. Honestly I couldn’t have passed the course without the support of the college. Amazing place to study. The vibe, energy is just what you need to focus and achieve your goals. I have landed a good job. Completing the course has opened up many doors for me and I  recommend Regent College. It could change your life.

    Florin Micu

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    Very responsive staff and easy-going, helpful and experienced tutors. Teaching is of high quality. I find the classes organized and i am happy with the way things are going.

    Andreea-Loredana Costea

    BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-Up

    The lecturers teach and explain modules in the best way possible so that students can understand. The recruitment staff are very nice and very helpful every time you have a problem. Quick problem solving and efficient service from the start to the end at Regent College London.

    Hang Boi Quek

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    The lecturers are very professional in carrying out their duties and they are very helpful and patient with the students regardless of their bad behaviour. I strongly recommend Regent College London as college to pursue higher education. The knowledge that I gained from learning at Regent College after attending classes for just two months is more than what I learned at another college where I was for two years.

    Course enquiry

    • We take your privacy seriously and will only use your personal data to provide you the services you have requested from us. We will store your personal data for 5 years.

    •  
    • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

    Regent College London aims to provide current information for our prospectus and website at all times however, it may occasionally be unable to run an advertised course for reasons of operational viability and student experience. In the event that a course is unable to run, or is only available at a different location, we will advise applicants and enrolled students at the earliest possible opportunity in writing. Applicants and students will, wherever feasible, be offered an alternative course or location of study.
